examples: She refused to testify against her husband.
Ella se negó a testificar contra su esposo.
There are several witnesses who will testify for the defence.
Hay varios testigos que testificarán para la defensa.
He was summoned to testify before a grand jury about his role in the affair.
Fue citado para testificar ante un gran jurado sobre su papel en el asunto.
Evans testified to receiving $200 000 in bribes.
Evans testificó haber recibido $ 200 000 en sobornos.
